name: Venture (itch)
description:
This is [A DEMO] all that is left from a project of mine that I had to cancel due to losing game files. Unfortunately the priority of remaking the game is low as I made it in Game Maker Studio and would have to remake it all and relearn its coding language as I have moved to Unity. Regardless, I felt that the demo is still quite fun despite it being really short. 

3 known bugs:

- jumping on loading token when not advanced past title screen will soft lock game. If you do that, just restart the game and dont do it again ;)

- level 5 may have some issues the first time. A restart will solve this issue

- level 9 is, for some reason, dodgy... You will have to have john stand on george and jump up to the exit to advance

Would love to fix these bugs but no game files lol.
